title: Bug 7734: System can be shut down without savefile warnings
description: The system can be shut down without displaying savefile warnings.
OB: System can be shut down without any warning or prompt to save files.
EB: The expected behavior is to provide a 'Do you want to save your file' dialog box with options: Yes, No, Cancel. Choosing 'Cancel' should halt the shutdown.
SR:
1. Open any application and create/edit a file.
2. Attempt to shut down the system without saving the file.
3. Observe the lack of a 'Do you want to save your file' dialog and the absence of options to save or cancel the shutdown.
